verbs.description: Although [ARG0: he] [V: voted] [ARG1: for Donald Trump] , Marc Straus , of Boca Raton , Florida , emerged beaming from the Penthouse Club in New Orleans on Wednesday night after his brief encounter with Stormy

[ARGM-ADV: Although he voted for Donald Trump] , [ARG0: Marc Straus , of Boca Raton , Florida] , [V: emerged] [ARG1: beaming from the Penthouse Club in New Orleans] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday night] [ARGM-TMP: after his brief encounter with Stormy]

Although he voted for Donald Trump , [ARG0: Marc Straus , of Boca Raton , Florida] , emerged [V: beaming] [ARGM-DIR: from the Penthouse Club in New Orleans] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday night] [ARGM-TMP: after his brief encounter with Stormy]
